evidence.claim: Pharmacy Healthcare Solutions complies with HIPAA regulations to ensure patient data protection.
Transactions involving healthcare claims are supported through X12 formats.
Integration with Health Information Exchanges using FHIR standards.
Utilization of HL7 protocols for data sharing between EHRs.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in EDI X12 transactions as a healthcare solutions provider for payers and providers.
